message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,000. It's a great deal for a product worth at least $10,000 to you. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product is worth $10,000 to me, so I would like to propose a counteroffer of $9,500. I hope this is within your consideration.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $9,500 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $10,500.  This is still a great deal for a product worth $10,000 to you.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. While I appreciate the reduction, I would like to counter with an offer of $10,000. This aligns closely with the perceived value of the product to me.
